00135 SBW_API std::vector<ModuleDescriptor> *SBWLowLevel::getModuleDescriptors(bool includeRunning, bool localOnly)
00136 {
00137         std::vector<DataBlockReader> lists ;
00138         
00139         getBrokerMethod("{}[] getModuleDescriptors(boolean, boolean)").
00140                 call(DataBlockWriter() << localOnly << includeRunning) >> lists ;
00141 
00142         std::vector<ModuleDescriptor> *descriptors =
00143                 new std::vector<ModuleDescriptor>(lists.size());
00144 
00145         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00146         
00147         while (i != lists.size())
00148         {
00149                 (*descriptors)[i] = ModuleDescriptor(lists[i]);
00150                 i++ ;
00151         }
00152 
00153         return descriptors ;
00154 }

00177 std::vector<Module> *SBWLowLevel::createModuleArray(const std::vector<Integer>&moduleIds)
00178 {
00179         std::vector<Module> *modules = new std::vector<Module>(moduleIds.size());
00180 
00181         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00182 
00183         while (i != moduleIds.size())
00184         {
00185                 (*modules)[i] = Module(moduleIds[i]);
00186                 i++;
00187         }
00188 
00189         return modules ;
00190 }

00292 void SBWLowLevel::initialiseListenerForC()
00293 {
00294         if (listenerForC == NULL)
00295         {
00296                 listenerForC = new SBWListenerForC();
00297                 listenerConsolidator.addListener(listenerForC);
00298         }
00299 }

00306 SBW_API std::vector<Module> *SBWLowLevel::getExistingModuleInstances()
00307 {
00308         std::vector<Integer> moduleIds ;
00309 
00310         getBrokerMethod(
00311                 "int[] getExistingModuleInstanceIds()").call(DataBlockWriter()) >> moduleIds ;
00312 
00313         return createModuleArray(moduleIds);
00314 }

00324 SBW_API std::vector<Module> *SBWLowLevel::getExistingModuleInstances(std::string moduleName)
00325 {
00326         std::vector<Module> *modules = getExistingModuleInstances();
00327         std::vector<Module>::iterator moduleItr = modules->begin();
00328 
00329         while (moduleItr != modules->end())
00330         {
00331                 if ((*moduleItr).getDescriptor().getName() == moduleName)
00332                         moduleItr++ ;
00333                 else
00334                         moduleItr = modules->erase(moduleItr);
00335         }
00336 
00337         return modules ;
00338 }

00362 SBW_API std::vector<ServiceDescriptor> *SBWLowLevel::findServices(
00363         std::string category, bool recursive /* = true */)
00364 {
00365         std::vector<DataBlockReader> listArray ;
00366 
00367         getBrokerMethod("{}[] findServices(string,boolean)").call(
00368                 DataBlockWriter() << category << recursive) >> listArray ;
00369 
00370         std::vector<ServiceDescriptor> *result =
00371                 new std::vector<ServiceDescriptor>(listArray.size());
00372 
00373         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00374 
00375         while (i != listArray.size())
00376         {
00377                 (*result)[i] = ServiceDescriptor(listArray[i]);
00378                 i++ ;
00379         }
00380 
00381         return result ;
00382 }

00390 bool SBWLowLevel::isSubCategory(std::string category, std::string subCategory)
00391 {
00392         int position = subCategory.find(category) ;
00393 
00394         return position == 0 &&
00395                 (subCategory.length() == category.length() || subCategory[category.length()] == '/');
00396 }

00440 SBW_API bool SBWLowLevel::processArguments(int argc, char* argv[])
00441 {
00442         int i = 0;
00443         bool moduleMode = false ;
00444 
00445         while (i != argc)
00446         {
00447                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-sbwdebug") == 0)
00448                 {
00449 #ifndef _DEBUG
00450                         std::cerr << "-sbwdebug flag will have no effect.  Use debug library to enable tracing\n";
00451 #endif
00452                         SBWDebug::setTraceMode();
00453                 }
00454                 else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-sbwregister") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-sbwmodule"))
00455                         moduleMode = true ;
00456 
00457 
00458                 i++ ;
00459         }
00460 
00461         return moduleMode ;
00462 }

00476                 e->log();
00477                 delete e ;
00478         }
00479 }

00494 SBW_API std::string SBWLowLevel::methodGetHelpInString(Integer moduleInstanceId, Integer serviceId, Integer methodId)
00495 {
00496         std::string result ;
00497 
00498         rpc->call(
00499                 moduleInstanceId,
00500                 SBWSystemService,
00501                 SBWGetMethodHelpMethod,
00502                 DataBlockWriter() << serviceId << methodId) >> result ;
00503 
00504         return result;
00505 }

00577 SBW_API std::string SBWLowLevel::methodGetSignatureInString(Integer moduleInstanceId, Integer serviceId, Integer methodId)
00578 {
00579         DataBlockWriter args ;
00580 
00581         args << serviceId ;
00582 
00583         DataBlockReader result =
00584                 methodCall(moduleInstanceId, SBWSystemService, SBWGetMethodsMethod, args);
00585         std::vector<std::string> methods ;
00586 
00587         result >> methods ;
00588 
00589         return methods[methodId];
00590 }

00598 SBW_API char *SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(const char *s)
00599 {
00600         char *result = (char *)malloc(strlen(s) + 1);
00601 
00602         strcpy(result, s);
00603         
00604         return result ;
00605 }

00639 SBW_API ServiceMethod SBWLowLevel::getBrokerMethod(const char *signature)
00640 {
00641         return
00642                 Module(SBWBrokerModule).
00643                         findServiceByName(SBWRPC::brokerServiceName).getMethod(signature);
00644 }

00652 SBW_API Integer SBWLowLevel::getModuleInstance(const char *moduleIdentificationName)
00653 {
00654         Integer brokerService = moduleFindServiceByName(SBWBrokerModule, SBWRPC::brokerServiceName);
00655         Integer getModuleInstanceMethodId =
00656                 serviceGetMethod(SBWBrokerModule, brokerService, "int getModuleInstance(string)");
00657         DataBlockWriter args ;
00658 
00659 
00660         args << moduleIdentificationName ;
00661 
00662         Integer moduleId ;
00663         DataBlockReader result =
00664                 methodCall(SBWBrokerModule, brokerService, getModuleInstanceMethodId, args);
00665 
00666         result >> moduleId ;
00667 
00668         return moduleId ;
00669 }

00712 SBW_API Integer SBWLowLevel::moduleGetNumberOfServices(Integer moduleInstanceId)
00713 {
00714         DataBlockWriter args ;
00715         DataBlockReader result =
00716                 methodCall(moduleInstanceId, SBWSystemService, SBWGetServicesMethod, args);
00717         std::vector<std::string> services ;
00718 
00719         result >> services ;
00720         return services.size();
00721 }
00722 
00729 SBW_API Integer SBWLowLevel::moduleFindServiceByName(Integer moduleInstanceId, const char *serviceName)
00730 {
00731         DataBlockWriter args ;
00732         DataBlockReader result =
00733                 methodCall(moduleInstanceId, SBWSystemService, SBWGetServicesMethod, args);
00734         std::vector<std::string> services ;
00735         Integer serviceId = 0 ;
00736 
00737         result >> services ;
00738 
00739         while (serviceId != (Integer) services.size()
00740                && services[serviceId].compare(serviceName))
00741                 serviceId++ ;
00742 
00743         if (serviceId == (Integer) services.size())
00744                 throw new SBWServiceNotFoundException("service not found");
00745 
00746         return serviceId ;
00747 }
00748

00769 SBW_API ServiceDescriptor SBWLowLevel::serviceGetDescriptorHandle(Integer moduleInstanceId, Integer serviceId)
00770 {
00771         DataBlockWriter args ;
00772         std::vector<std::string> services ;
00773         
00774         methodCall(moduleInstanceId, SBWSystemService, SBWGetServicesMethod, args) >> services ;
00775 
00776         if (serviceId < 0 || serviceId >= (Integer) services.size())
00777         {
00778                 char buffer[200];
00779 
00780                 sprintf(
00781                         buffer,
00782                         "service id, %d, does not exist on the module instance %d",
00783                         serviceId,
00784                         moduleInstanceId);
00785 
00786                 throw new SBWServiceNotFoundException(buffer);
00787         }
00788         
00789         DataBlockReader list ;
00790 
00791         getBrokerMethod("{} getServiceDescriptor(int,string)").call(
00792                 DataBlockWriter() << moduleInstanceId << services[serviceId]) >> list;
00793 
00794         return ServiceDescriptor(list);
00795 }
00796 
00804 SBW_API Integer SBWLowLevel::serviceGetMethod(Integer moduleInstanceId, Integer serviceId, const char *signature)
00805 {
00806         DataBlockWriter args ;
00807         
00808         args << serviceId ;
00809 
00810         DataBlockReader result =
00811                 methodCall(moduleInstanceId, SBWSystemService, SBWGetMethodsMethod, args);
00812         std::vector<std::string> methods ;
00813 
00814         result >> methods ;
00815 
00816         return sbwSignature::match(methods, signature);
00817 }
00818

00847 Integer *SBWLowLevel::mapModuleArrayForC(std::vector<Module> *modules, Integer *numberOfModuleInstances)
00848 {
00849         Integer i = *numberOfModuleInstances = modules->size();
00850         Integer *result = (Integer *)calloc(i, sizeof(Integer));
00851 
00852         while (i != 0)
00853         {
00854                 i-- ;
00855                 result[i] = (*modules)[i].getModuleInstanceId();
00856         }
00857 
00858         delete modules ;
00859 
00860         return result ;
00861 }
00862 
00870 sbwSignatureElement **SBWLowLevel::mapSignatureElements(std::vector<SignatureElement> *args, Integer *numberOfArgs)
00871 {
00872         int i = *numberOfArgs = args->size();
00873         sbwSignatureElement **result = new sbwSignatureElement *[i];
00874 
00875         while (i != 0)
00876         {
00877                 i-- ;
00878                 result[i] = (*args)[i].getImpl();
00879                 result[i]->AddReference();
00880         }
00881 
00882         delete args ;
00883 
00884         return result ;
00885 }
